name: Ponda Baba (V)
Lore: 'A male Quara (or fingered Aqualish). Thug, smuggler and partner of Dr. Evazan. Has a poor quality cybernetic arm replacement.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots.  Game text of non-Jedi Luke (or a lightsaber he is using) may not target aliens here.  During battle, if with a smuggler, may add a destiny to attrition (+2 if with your smuggler) or make that smuggler forfeit = 0.(Original Concept by Mike Raveling - Minnesota States 2008)',
